name: Dice Master - Easy and Fun
description:
Yatzy is one of the oldest and most popular classic dice games in the world! "Dice Master" has made a small improvement on the classic rules of Yatzy, but it is still easy to understand and becomes more simple and interesting!

In "Dice Master", your goal can be to collect various special dice, or to obtain achievements in the game!

Features
Realistic Yatzy experience
Exercise and relax your brain
Earn rewards by correctly locking the dice
Lucky wheel can give you more rewards
Collect all kinds of special dice
Change to the dice style you like

Download "Dice Master" now and play now!
